short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Batman Runner Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome's Offline Running Dino Game in Batman Theme

Do you miss playing the Chrome offline dinosaur game when your internet connection is down? Well, now you can play it anytime, even when you're online!

Introducing Online Dino, a version of the Chrome Dinosaur Game that has been extended and modified with a Batman theme. The controls are the same: press up or space to jump and down to duck. Dodge cactuses, enemies, and other obstacles to reach a high score.

This game is a great way to pass the time and improve your reflexes. There are no cheats or computer help, so you'll have to rely on your own skills to succeed.

To play Online Dino, simply click on the toolbar icon and press Space to start the game. You can also play it offline by turning off your internet connection.

So what are you waiting for? Start playing Online Dino today!

Here are some additional details about the game:

The game is played in an endless runner format, where you try to run as far as possible without crashing.
The obstacles in the game include cactuses, enemies, and other objects.
You can jump and duck to avoid obstacles.
You can also collect power-ups to help you survive.
The game gets faster as you progress, so it becomes more challenging.
The game has a high score leaderboard, so you can compete with other players.

- Play others games on the top-left menu
